DOC.brief_summary: To compare postoperative nausea vomiting ( PONV ) perioperative outcome gynecologic patient undergo laparoscopic surgery schedule administration intravenous Ramosetron hospital stay . - Randomized controlled arm : Placebo versus Ramosetron injection - Administration schedule : immediate postoperative status , 12 hr surgery , 36hrs surgery
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Prevention Nausea Vomiting Gynecologic Laparoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: Surgical outcome include operative time , blood loss , Hb change , postoperative pain , nausea/vomiting scale , time rescue therapy , complication
DOC.criteria: Age : 18 < = , = < 70 benign gynecologic disease ASAClass III Nodefinite malignancy US , CT/MRI , CA 125 < 500IU/ml Nonsmoker Conversion laparotomy Hx malignancy Smoker Suspicious malignancy
